titleStmt.title: The mapp and description of Nevv-England together with a discourse of plantation, and collonies: also, a relation of the nature of the climate, and how it agrees with our owne country England. How neere it lyes to New-found-land, Virginia, Noua Francia, Canada, and other parts of the West-Indies. Written by Sr. William Alexander, Knight.
Encouragement to colonies
titleStmt.author: Stirling, William Alexander, Earl of, 1567 or 8-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Stansby] for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with quire A cancelled and cancel title page, of: An encourgement to colonies: London : Printed by William Stansby, 1624.
Running title reads: An encouragement to colonies.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
